issue.title: [R] Add bindings for filesystem API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6438](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6438). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See ARROW-5494 for the Python bindings. Along with ARROW-6437, we'll be able to support file-system-like operations in S3. Some of this also may be necessary for the Datasets API bindings.
